org.apache.polygene.test.cache

Class MemoryCachePoolMixin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.polygene.test.cache.MemoryCachePoolMixin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceActivation, CachePool, MemoryCachePoolService

    public abstract class MemoryCachePoolMixin
extends Object
implements MemoryCachePoolService
    In-Memory CachePool Mixin based on ConcurrentHashMap.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchCache

        public <T> Cache<T> fetchCache(String cacheId,
                               Class<T> valueType)
        Description copied from interface: CachePool
        Fetches a cache from the pool. If the cache does not exist already, then a new Cache should be created and returned. For each fetchCache() call, a reference count on the Cache must be increased.
        Specified by:
        fetchCache in interface CachePool
        Type Parameters:
        T - Value type
        Parameters:
        cacheId - The reference of the cache. If the same id is given as a previous fetch, the same cache will be returned.
        valueType - Value type
        Returns:
        The cache fetched from the pool.

      • returnCache

        public void returnCache(Cache<?> cache)
        Description copied from interface: CachePool
        Returns the cache back to the pool. The reference count for the cache must then be decreased and if the count reaches zero, the Cache should be destroyed and cleared from memory.
        Specified by:
        returnCache in interface CachePool
        Parameters:
        cache - The cache to return to the pool.

                     throws Exception

        Throws:
